name: altech-field-lead
description: Mobile-first field intake wizard for insurance lead collection

scripts.build:extension: pwsh -NoProfile -Command "Remove-Item -Force altech-ezlynx-extension.zip -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Compress-Archive -Path 'chrome-extension\*' -DestinationPath 'altech-ezlynx-extension.zip'; Write-Host '[Altech] Extension zip rebuilt.'"
scripts.prepare: node -e "try { require('child_process').execSync('git config core.hooksPath .githooks'); } catch(e) {}" && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const p='.githooks/pre-commit'; const s=fs.statSync(p,{throwIfNoEntry:false}); if(s) { try { fs.chmodSync(p, 0o755); } catch(e) {} }"

author: Austin Kays
